greetings: Hello. Was your first day on the job alright?
Did you notice anyone suspicious in the house?
responseAffterReport: So even on the first day, someone slipped up.
Our people will handle it tonight.
responseAffterNoReport: Looks like no one slipped up on the first day.
They’re dangerous. We need to identify them quickly.

greetings: Hello. Did you find anyone unusual?
I hope you did your job well today.
responseAffterReport: Well done. We’ll take care of him tonight.
responseAffterNoReport: Pay closer attention tomorrow. They’re truly dangerous.
Watch for those whose words don’t match, or sound inhuman.
signOff: Report to me at the end of your shift.

greetings: Hello, I was looking forward to your call.
responseAffterReport: It seems the radiation they emit has begun changing people.
From now on it’ll be harder to spot them.
responseAffterNoReport: Are you even taking this seriously?
Don’t hide the truth from me.
People have already been changed by them. They’re very dangerous.
